title: Dun dun duuuuun....
author: JGray
text:
How would someone know that Chrys and Mandrake would be passing by here? Interesting question, isn't it? Something's afoot...

We'll be switching over to Theresa and William again next week. It is time they have a little talk about him hitting her in the head with a brick.

replies.author: Azure*Guest*
replies.text: Seems the thief had a deal going with the ship merchant. But why? Why split the take?

replies.author: JD*Guest*
replies.text: Doubt it was the thief, too petty.  Likely something more nefarious.
